programme.title: Manchester City vs. Manchester United - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: Manchester City have won five of their last eight Premier League matches against Manchester United, though they failed to win either game last season for the first time since 2020-21. Manchester United have inflicted 25% of Pep Guardiola’s total home Premier League defeats as Man City manager, with the Red Devils winning four times there against the Spaniard. They are looking for consecutive wins at the Etihad for the first time since March 2021.

programme.title: Arsenal vs. Nottingham Forest - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: In all competitions, Arsenal have won their last six home games against Nottingham Forest by an aggregate score of 19-2. The Gunners are unbeaten in 14 games on home soil against Forest since a 3-1 defeat back in March 1989. Nottingham Forest have won just two out of 16 Premier League matches against Arsenal and both wins came at the City Ground, in 1996-97 and 2022-23.

programme.title: Burnley vs. Liverpool - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: Burnley have lost 14 of their 18 Premier League matches against Liverpool, including each of their last five in a row since a 1-0 win at Anfield in January 2021. Liverpool have won eight of their nine away Premier League matches at Turf Moor against Burnley, winning the last six in a row. The Reds have won seven away top-flight games in a row against three teams previously: West Brom, Norwich and Crystal Palace.

programme.title: Athletic Club vs Arsenal FC - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD1
programme.desc: This will be the first competitive meeting between Athletic Club and Arsenal, and just the third time the Lions have faced an English opponent in the European Cup/UEFA Champions League. If Arsenal win this game, they will become the first side in European Cup/UEFA Champions League history to win six consecutive matches against Spanish sides. Indeed, they have won all five of their matches against Spanish opposition across the last two campaigns.

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Olympique de Marseille - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD1
programme.desc: Real Madrid have won all four of their games against Marseille in European competition. If they win this match, Marseille will be the opponent they have beaten the most times in the European Cup/UEFA Champions League while maintaining a 100 percent record. Only against FC Porto have Marseille suffered more defeats in the European Cup/UEFA Champions League than they have against Real Madrid. Indeed, Los Blancos are the opponent they’ve faced most often across the two competitions while losing every time.

PSG vs Atalanta BC - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD1
programme.desc: This will be just the second meeting between Paris SG and Atalanta, following a victory for the French side in the UEFA Champions League quarter-final in 2019-20. Only one of the last 11 meetings between Paris SG and an Italian side in major European competition have been won by the Italians. Indeed, the French side’s last game in the UEFA Champions League was a 5-0 victory over Internazionale in last season’s final – the biggest ever margin of victory in a European Cup/Champions League showpiece.

Al Hilal SFC (KSA) vs Al Duhail SC (QAT) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD1
programme.desc: Al Duhail won their first AFC Champions League Elite meeting with Al-Hilal, but Al-Hilal are unbeaten in the six since, including their joint-biggest win in the competition – Al Duhail’s heaviest defeat in the tournament. Qatari teams have lost their last five matches against Saudi sides in the competition; their last win was Al Sadd’s 2-1 victory over Al-Nassr in December 2014. Qatari teams have lost more matches and conceded more goals against Saudi teams than against any other nation.

programme.title: Buriram United (THA) vs Johor Darul Ta’zim FC (MAS) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - East MD
programme.desc: Buriram United are unbeaten in their three AFC Champions League Elite matches against Johor Darul Ta’zim, with the only goal scored in those matches coming in the most recent such game. Buriram United have only lost two of their nine AFC Champions League Elite season opening matches, winning three and drawing four such games; unbeaten in their last three games in the group stage of the competition, a win or a draw here will see them go unbeaten in four consecutive such games for the first time since 2018.

programme.title: AFC Bournemouth vs Brighton and Hove Albion - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 4
programme.desc: Bournemouth won four of their first six Premier League matches against Brighton and Hove Albion but they have since lost five of their last six against the Seagulls. Brighton have won two of their last three away league visits to Bournemouth – the Seagulls are looking for consecutive away wins at the Cherries for the first time since February 1932.

programme.title: Al Duhail vs Um Salal - Qatar Stars League 2025/26 - W4
programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. The most famous participating clubs are Al-Sadd, the champions of the last season; Al-Rayyan and Al-Arabi, the popular teams, Al-Duhail and Al-Gharafa, serious contenders for the title every season. The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

programme.title: Nikola karabatic 20 Years Of Glory
programme.desc: Renowned as one of the greatest handball players of the century, Nikola retires on May 31 after his final game with PSG Handball. His career concludes with the Paris 2024 Olympic Games. A four-time World Champion, three-time Olympic gold medalist, and three-time World Handball Player of the Year, Nikola plans to take a break from his career to spend more time with his family.

programme.title: Montpellier vs Dijon - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germains 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: Qatar Prix de lArc de Triomphe 2024 Highlight
programme.desc: The Qatar Arc de Triomphe Horse Racing Festival is considered one of the strongest races in the world, in which the most famous owners in the world, the best horses, the best trainers and the strongest riders participate. The horse Al Ghadeer was able to continue his successive victories, awaiting the crowning with the Triple Crown in the Emir of Qatar Sword in February 2025 after his victory in Qatar Goodwood and the Arc de Triomphe in Paris.

programme.title: HL - World series Triathlon - Dubai - Men’s Final
programme.desc: The worlds top ranked Olympic champions competed for the titles of the last round ( Dubai ) of the World Triathlon Diamond League in an exciting atmosphere over long distances, including a 2000m swim, 80km cycling and 18km non-stop running. It is worth noting that the total prize money for this round was two million dollars.
